alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A heavy mixed rain and snow shower will impact portions of Queens, Bronx, western Suffolk, Kings, New York (Manhattan) and Nassau Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a mixed heavy rain and snow shower over Park Slope, or over Crown Heights, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This activity will be near... Forest Hills and Canarsie around 705 PM EDT. Jamaica and Rockaway Beach around 710 PM EDT. Kennedy Airport around 715 PM EDT. Valley Stream and Long Beach around 720 PM EDT. Hempstead and Oceanside around 725 PM EDT. Levittown and Freeport around 730 PM EDT. Massapequa and Jones Beach around 735 PM EDT. Amityville around 740 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk
